divs: Sighting DetailsThe photos were while on a snow mobile trip located on Washington Mountain in MA. The person who had taken the pictures only noticed the helicopters but not the ufo. I was viewing the trip photos and noticed the ufo's. My friend at the time, said he was just taking pictures of the military in practice and never noticed anything else.
